"In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops," Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a Feb. 9 email to employees. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer had apparently considered a number of internal and external candidates before choosing Satya Nadella , who will replace Bob Muglia .
